Clicked the "Primer / design" project link to navigate to the repository page.
```click("624")```

Clicked the Issues link to navigate to the project's issues page.
```click("347")```

Clicked on Issue #10 "Clarify usage of flash alert" to open it for assignment.
```click("1118")```

Clicked the Edit link next to Assignee to change issue assignment.
```click("1198")```

Selected "Byte Blaze @byteblaze" from the assignee dropdown to assign the issue to myself.
```click("1449")```

Used keyboard navigation to select "Byte Blaze @byteblaze" from the assignee dropdown.
```keyboard_press("ArrowDown")```

Pressed the down arrow key to navigate to "Byte Blaze @byteblaze" in the assignee dropdown.
```keyboard_press("ArrowDown")```

Pressed the down arrow key to select "Byte Blaze @byteblaze" and then pressed Enter to confirm the selection.
```keyboard_press("ArrowDown")```

Pressed Enter to select "Byte Blaze @byteblaze" from the dropdown and assign the issue.
```keyboard_press("Enter")```

Assigned the flash alert issue to "Byte Blaze @byteblaze" via the assignee dropdown, confirming the assignment in the sidebar.
```send_msg_to_user("Successfully assigned the issue 'Clarify usage of flash alert' (#10) to myself (@byteblaze).")```
